markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arsenic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=104)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 550 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This toxin is a compound of arsenic and other substances. You can't reduce your [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition while affected.

**Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 5 minutes; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and sickened 1 (1 minute); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and sickened 2 (1 minute); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage and sickened 3 (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Arsenic
